snippet: SIROKA-- Shirley. JASA, its officers, and its Board of Trustees extend our deepest sympathy to long-time Trustee and Vice President of the Board, Martin Siroka and his family on the passing of his beloved mother, Shirley Siroka. May her memory be a blessing. 1/3
lead_paragraph: SIROKA-- Shirley. JASA, its officers, and its Board of Trustees extend our deepest sympathy to long-time Trustee and Vice President of the Board, Martin Siroka and his family on the passing of his beloved mother, Shirley Siroka. May her memory be a blessing. 1/3
